title: Elvis Presley - C'mon Everybody FLAC
description:
C'mon Everybody is a compilation album by Elvis Presley. The album was released in July 1971. All tracks from this album originated from four of Elvis's films and were only released on soundtrack EP's prior to this issue. The remaining EP tracks from the same four movies were compiled into another album, "I Got Lucky", released three months later. It was certified Gold on 1/6/2004 by the RIAA.


Side one	
No.	Title	Length	
1.	"C'mon Everybody" (from Viva Las Vegas)	2:18
2.	"Angel" (from Follow That Dream)	2:38
3.	"Easy Come, Easy Go" (from Easy Come, Easy Go)	2:10
4.	"A Whistling Tune" (from Kid Galahad)	2:38
5.	"Follow That Dream" (from Follow That Dream)	1:37
Side two	
No.	Title	Length	
1.	"King Of The Whole Wide World" (from Kid Galahad)	2:07
2.	"I'll Take Love" (from Easy Come, Easy Go)	2:13
3.	"Today, Tomorrow And Forever" (from Viva Las Vegas)	3:25
4.	"I'm Not The Marrying Kind" (from Follow That Dream)	1:50
5.	"This Is Living" (from Kid Galahad)	1:43
